content: Singaporean computer scientist **Beng Chin Ooi** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 黃銘鈞; [pinyin](/wiki/Pinyin): *Huáng Míngjūn*) is a Singaporean computer scientist, currently a Qiushi Chair Professor at [Zhejiang University](/wiki/Zhejiang_University) and a professor at the School of Software Technology, [Zhejiang University](/wiki/Zhejiang_University). Previously, he was the Lee Kong Chian Centennial Professor and served as the Dean of the School of Computing at the [National University of Singapore](/wiki/National_University_of_Singapore) from 2007 to 2013. He was also an adjunct Chang Jiang Professor at [Zhejiang University](/wiki/Zhejiang_University). Additionally, he is a Visiting Distinguished Chair Professor at the [National University of Singapore](/wiki/National_University_of_Singapore), a Visiting Chair Professor at [Peking University](/wiki/Peking_University), and a Visiting Distinguished Professor at [Tsinghua University](/wiki/Tsinghua_University). He is a Fellow of the [Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers](/wiki/Institute_of_Electrical_and_Electronics_Engineers) 2009, [Association for Computing Machinery](/wiki/Association_for_Computing_Machinery) 2011, [China Computer Federation](/wiki/China_Computer_Federation) 2024, [Singapore National Academy of Science](/wiki/Singapore_National_Academy_of_Science) 2016, and Singapore Academy of Engineering 2023. He is a foreign member of [Academia Europaea](/wiki/Academia_Europaea) 2022, and [Chinese Academy of Sciences](/wiki/Chinese_Academy_of_Sciences) 2023. He did his BSc (1985) and PhD (1989) at [Monash University](/wiki/Monash_University). Beng Chin was the recipient of the 2009 ACM SIGMOD Contributions award, 2020 ACM SIGMOD EF Codd Innovations Award, 2024 ACM SIGMOD Systems Award, and a co-recipient of the 2011 Singapore President's Science Award. He was also the recipient of 2012 IEEE Computer Society Kanai award, 2014 IEEE TCDE CSEE (Computer Science, Engineering and Education) Impact Award, and 2016 China Computer Federation (CCF) Overseas Outstanding Contributions Award. - Beng Chin Ooi publications indexed by [Google Scholar](/wiki/Google_Scholar) This Singaporean biographical article is a stub.
